title: Audio from reciever or earphone and audio input is not working. Any app using microphone is getting crashed as soon as it gets open.
content: Earlier my device used to get audio problem but after rebooting it used to work normal. But now Any app which uses microphones is getting crashed and mobile automatically reboots. Aftr factory reset it works normally for sometime but just for few seconds or minutes. Its of no use now i can only click picture thats all. Any help?
